divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving west on Washington Street, about 4500 block. My son said, look, there is a ufo, I looked south, and sure enough, there was one. I hurried and parked the car, and watched it for about 10 minutes, until it disappeared. It was round, flashed lights from the bottom, in a pattern. It seemed to be just above the tree level. It looked like it was drawing power from the powerlines or was drawing water from a lake.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around November 30th 1980
